name: tagBuildOrRelease
description: Adds tags to a build or release
author: Colin Dembovsky (colinsalmcorner.com)

inputs.name: type
inputs.label: Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Type of entity to tag. Set to build to let the build tag itself. Set to release to let the release tag itself. Set to build in a release to tag the _primary build_ for the release.

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tags to tag the build/release with. Use multiple lines to specify multiple tags.
